tile module¶

class tile.Tile(value1, value2)¶

Bases : object

A class that represents a tile of a domino game.

…

value1¶

The smallest value of the tile

Type

int

value2¶

The highest value of the tile

Type

int

is_double¶

A boolean set to True if the tile is a double and False otherwise

Type

bool

score¶

the score of the tile

Type

int

orientation¶

The physcical orientation of a tile once played on the board

Type

int

rotate():

Add 90 degrees to the orientation of a tile

flip():

Flip a tile of 180 degrees

flip()¶

Flip a tile by 180 degrees module 360. This method is used to place a tile on the board.

See rotate() method for more info

Renvoie

Type renvoyé

None

imageTile(index_player, action)¶
rotate()¶

Make a 90 degrees modulo 360 turn to a tile. This method is used to place a tile on the board.

Renvoie

Type renvoyé

None
